document.title: Protection Guide
document.disclaimer: This guide is being provided for informational purposes only and does not supersede the policy wording provided to you upon purchase, which is the sole source of the available benefits and is the governing document.

categories.name: Personal, Health & Family
categories.description: Events affecting the guest, companion, or immediate family that prevent attending the stay.

categories.name: Travel & Transportation
categories.description: Travel disruptions or incidents impacting the ability to arrive for the stay.

categories.name: Home & Property
categories.description: Home-related emergencies or incidents requiring the guest’s attention.

categories.name: Work & Legal
categories.description: Work or legal obligations/conflicts preventing attendance.

categories.name: Security & Fraud
categories.description: Theft or fraud events tied to the booking or vehicle.

categories.name: Other
categories.description: Coverage reasons that do not fit cleanly into other categories.

coverage_reasons.title: Active Military Duty
coverage_reasons.trigger_summary: Active duty military status change impacting approved personal time off.
coverage_reasons.policy_text: Hotel Guest, a companion, or an immediate family member, who are on active military duty, having their personal time off status changed.

coverage_reasons.title: Automobile Theft
coverage_reasons.trigger_summary: Theft of the hotel guest’s automobile shortly before the stay prevents attending.
coverage_reasons.policy_text: Theft of Hotel Guest's automobile within 48 hours of the Stay that results in inability to attend the Stay.

coverage_reasons.title: Complications of Pregnancy
coverage_reasons.trigger_summary: A physician advises the hotel guest or companion not to attend due to pregnancy complications.
coverage_reasons.policy_text: Hotel Guest or their companion have been advised by a physician due to complications of pregnancy to not attend the Stay.

coverage_reasons.title: Family Member or Companion Death
coverage_reasons.trigger_summary: Death of a family member or companion shortly before the stay.
coverage_reasons.policy_text: The death of a family member or companion within 30 days prior to the Stay.

coverage_reasons.title: Family Member's Childbirth
coverage_reasons.trigger_summary: Hotel guest attends an immediate family member’s childbirth at the time of the stay.
coverage_reasons.policy_text: Hotel Guest will be attending an immediate family member's childbirth at the time of the Stay.

coverage_reasons.title: Home Uninhabitable
coverage_reasons.trigger_summary: Home becomes uninhabitable due to listed incidents.
coverage_reasons.policy_text: Fire, Flood, Burglary, Vandalism and Natural Disaster causes home to be Uninhabitable.

coverage_reasons.title: Injury/Illness - Family Member
coverage_reasons.trigger_summary: Serious injury or illness occurs to hotel guest’s immediate family member.
coverage_reasons.policy_text: Serious injury or illness occurring to Hotel Guest's immediate family member. Immediate family member means your spouse (by marriage, common-law, or civil union) or your domestic partner; parent; child(ren), including children who are, or are in the process of becoming adopted; siblings; grandparent or grandchild(ren); stepparent; stepchild; stepsibling; legal guardian; ward; in-laws (father or mother), aunt, uncle, or first cousins. The only exclusion would be nephews/nieces.

coverage_reasons.title: Injury/Illness - You or Companion
coverage_reasons.trigger_summary: Serious injury or illness occurs to the guest or companion (includes COVID positive test).
coverage_reasons.policy_text: Serious injury or illness occurring to You or a Companion (including but not limited to testing positive for COVID).

coverage_reasons.title: Jury Duty
coverage_reasons.trigger_summary: Guest is required to appear in court (jury duty, subpoena, or court order).
coverage_reasons.policy_text: Hotel Guest is required to appear in court for Jury Duty, Subpoena or Court Order.

coverage_reasons.title: Layoffs
coverage_reasons.trigger_summary: Job layoff impacts hotel guest or companion.
coverage_reasons.policy_text: Job layoff for Hotel Guest or Companion.

coverage_reasons.title: Mechanical Breakdown
coverage_reasons.trigger_summary: Guest or companion’s automobile has a mechanical breakdown shortly before the stay.
coverage_reasons.policy_text: Hotel Guest or a companion’s automobile having a mechanical breakdown within 48 hours of the Stay.

coverage_reasons.title: Relocation
coverage_reasons.trigger_summary: Relocation required of the guest or spouse more than 100 miles from primary residence.
coverage_reasons.policy_text: Relocation required of You or Spouse more than 100 miles from primary residence.

coverage_reasons.title: Stolen Bookings
coverage_reasons.trigger_summary: Hotel guest’s or companion’s booking is stolen.
coverage_reasons.policy_text: Hotel Guest or a companion’s booking being stolen.

coverage_reasons.title: Traffic Accident
coverage_reasons.trigger_summary: Hotel guest or companion is directly involved in a traffic accident shortly before the stay.
coverage_reasons.policy_text: Hotel Guest or a companion being directly involved in a traffic accident within 48 hours of the Stay.

coverage_reasons.title: Traffic Accident on the Way to Travel Carrier
coverage_reasons.trigger_summary: Miss the stay due to a traffic accident while en route to a travel carrier.
coverage_reasons.policy_text: Hotel Guest, a companion, or an immediate family member miss the Stay due to a traffic accident enroute to a travel carrier.

coverage_reasons.title: Travel Carrier Delay
coverage_reasons.trigger_summary: Not arriving at the venue due to a delay by the travel carrier used for transportation.
coverage_reasons.policy_text: Hotel Guest or a companion not arriving at the venue due to a delay by the travel carrier used for transportation.

coverage_reasons.title: Unforeseen Severe Weather
coverage_reasons.trigger_summary: Severe weather conditions prevent the guest from attending the stay.
coverage_reasons.policy_text: Severe weather conditions which result in Hotel Guest's inability to attend the Stay.

coverage_reasons.title: Urgent Home Repair
coverage_reasons.trigger_summary: Urgent home repair requires the guest to be present during the repair.
coverage_reasons.policy_text: Urgent home repair that requires Hotel Guest to be present during the repair.

coverage_reasons.title: Weather Emergency
coverage_reasons.trigger_summary: Weather emergency occurs shortly before the stay.
coverage_reasons.policy_text: Weather emergency within 24 hours of the Stay.

coverage_reasons.title: Work-Related Travel Conflict
coverage_reasons.trigger_summary: A work-related travel conflict prevents attending the stay.
coverage_reasons.policy_text: Work-related travel conflict.

coverage_reasons.title: Hotel Guest Death
coverage_reasons.trigger_summary: Hotel guest’s death prior to the stay.
coverage_reasons.policy_text: Hotel Guest's death prior to the Stay.

matching_rules.notes: Use the policy_text as the authoritative description for each coverage reason. This JSON reflects the guide; the governing policy wording controls final benefits.
